scripts.prebuild: rimraf dist dist-firefox && mkdir dist && cp src/manifest.json dist && cp -r src/conf dist && cp -r src/css dist && cp -r src/html dist && cp -r src/icon dist && cp -r src/js dist
scripts.build:chromium: esbuild src/js/background.js --outdir=dist/js --bundle --minify && esbuild src/js/content.js --outdir=dist/js --bundle && node tool/remove-export.js
scripts.build:firefox: cp -r dist dist-firefox && cp src/manifest-firefox.json dist-firefox/manifest.json && node tool/fix-css.js dist-firefox/css/content.css
scripts.build: npm run build:chromium && npm run build:firefox && npm run build:firefox-xpi
